General.Name: Jiangsu Wuzhong Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: JiangSu WuZhong Pharmaceutical Development Co., Ltd. engages in pharmaceutical, medical cosmetology, investment, and other industries in China and internationally. It provides genetic and chemical drugs in the fields of anti-virus, anti infection, immune regulation, anti-tumor, digestive system, cardiovascular, etc.; and modern traditional Chinese medicine. The company also offers high-end injection filling products for medical cosmetology. It offers its products in various forms, such as hard capsules, granules, tablets, oral solutions, dropping pills, emulsions, large-volume injections, and small-volumes injections, powder injections, freeze-dried powder injections and raw materials, and other dosage forms. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Suzhou, China.
